resources.string: Welcome to Memory Book please select a relation below or got to help
Please select the memory below which you wish to view. Or use the microphone to talk dirrectly to the person.

This application is built to help you connect with your loved ones. Either use the menu options via the touch screen or press the microphone and then give your command. 

To view your memories, click the “View Memories” Icon or speak “View Memories”. To return to return to the main menu use the back button or say “Main Menu”. To View a memory click the person’s name or say the person’s Name. 

To play a memory provide use your finger to select the memory or speak the saved command associated with the memory. To play the next memory click next, to play the previous click previous or simply provide an additional command associated with a different menu. 

To Pause a memory click the pause button. And to close the application click the return button.
Sorry this features is not available yet!
